homeView.patchesConsentDialogText: ReVanced Patches needs to be downloaded.
homeView.patchesConsentDialogText3Sub: You can change this in settings at a later time.
homeView.updatesDisabled: Oppdatering av patchet app er for øyeblikket deaktivert. Repatch appen pånytt.

patcherView.armv7WarningDialogText: ARMv7 enheter er enda ikke støttet, å kan misslykkes. Ønsker du enda å fortsette?
patcherView.requiredOptionDialogText: Some patch options have to be set.

appSelectorView.featureNotAvailableText: Dette programmet er en splittet APK og kan ikke velges. Denne funksjonen er for øyeblikket bare tilgjengelig for rootede brukere. Du kan fremdeles installere applikasjonen ved å velge APK-filer fra enhetens lagring

patchesSelectorView.noSavedPatches:
No saved patches for the selected app.
Press Done to save current selection.
patchesSelectorView.noPatchesFound: No patches found for the selected app
patchesSelectorView.selectAllPatchesWarningContent: You are about to select all patches, that includes non-suggested patches and can cause unwanted behavior.

patchOptionsView.requiredOptionNull:
The following options have to be set:

{options}

patchItem.unsupportedPatchVersion: Patch is not supported for this app version. Enable the experimental toggle in settings to proceed.
patchItem.unsupportedRequiredOption: This patch contains a required option that is not supported by this app
patchItem.patchesChangeWarningDialogText:
It is recommended to use the default selection of patches because changing it may cause unexpected issues.

If you know what you are doing, you can enable "Enable changing selection" in the settings.

installerView.installTypeDescription: Select the installation type to proceed with.
installerView.notificationText: Tap to return to the installer
installerView.screenshotDetected:
A screenshot has been detected. If you are trying to share the log, please share a text copy instead.

Copy log to clipboard?
installerView.noExit: Installer is still running, cannot exit...

settingsView.dynamicThemeHint: Nyt en erfaring nærmere din enhet
settingsView.sourcesResetDialogText: Er du sikker på at du vil tilbakestille egendefinerte kilder til standardverdiene?
settingsView.apiURLResetDialogText: Er du sikker på at du vil tilbakestille API URL til dens standardverdi?
settingsView.sourcesUpdateNote:
Note: ReVanced Patches will be updated to the latest version automatically.

This will reveal your IP address to the server.
settingsView.contributorsHint: En liste med bidragsytere til ReVanced
settingsView.enablePatchesSelectionHint: Enable changing the selection of patches.
settingsView.enablePatchesSelectionWarningText:
Changing the default selection of patches may cause unexpected issues.

Enable anyways?
settingsView.disablePatchesSelectionWarningText:
You are about to disable changing the selection of patches.
The default selection of patches will be restored.

Disable anyways?
settingsView.autoUpdatePatchesHint: Automatically update ReVanced Patches to the latest version
settingsView.experimentalUniversalPatchesHint: Display all applications to use with universal patches, loading list of apps may be slower
settingsView.experimentalPatchesHint: Enable usage of unsupported patches in any app version
settingsView.restartAppForChanges: Restart the app to apply changes
settingsView.exportPatchesHint: Export patches selection to a JSON file
settingsView.importPatchesHint: Import patches selection from a JSON file
settingsView.resetStoredPatchesDialogText: Resetting patches selection will remove all selected patches.
settingsView.resetStoredOptionsDialogText: Resetting options will remove all saved options.
settingsView.regenerateKeystoreHint: Regenerate the keystore used to sign the app
settingsView.regenerateKeystoreDialogText: Patched apps signed with the old keystore will no longer be able to update.
settingsView.exportKeystoreHint: Export keystore used to sign apps
settingsView.importKeystoreHint: Import keystore used to sign apps
settingsView.selectKeystorePasswordHint: Select keystore password used to sign the apk
settingsView.jsonSelectorErrorMessage: Unable to use selected JSON file
settingsView.keystoreSelectorErrorMessage: Unable to use selected KEYSTORE file

appInfoView.unpatchDialogText: Are you sure you want to unpatch this app?
appInfoView.rootDialogText:
App was installed with superuser permissions, but currently ReVanced Manager has no permissions.
Please grant superuser permissions first.
appInfoView.updateNotImplemented: This feature has not been implemented yet
